title: LF Duo or team for ranked games. Bronze, maybe silver.
body:
Okay so, Im looking for people, either duo or 5s, not fussed, if I was in a 5s team I'd wanna go top as thats where I tend to have the most fun with champs.
Bronze elo as I haven't really done a lot of ranked before,  in solo Q I managed to get to silver V, but I lost 6 of my games, (I was support for them though)

Voice chat is a must. :D Not too fussed about being super pro or anything, but I would like to get into a group that actually work together and win fights. :D

I have a fair few champs, but my play pool is pretty small, so im also looking to expand upon that, but I mostly try and play {{champion:92}} when I can. She would have to be my favourite. 
um, anything else you want to know, ask, or anything, just hit me up. :D
